programme.title: Um Dia para Viver, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Travis Conrad um assassino profissional designado para matar uma testemunha. Mas, antes que finalizasse o trabalho, Travis morre. Logo em seguida ressuscitado para terminar o servio em 24 horas.

programme.title: Invaso das Sereias, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um jovem noivo deve partir para resgatar sua noiva depois que ela for sequestrada por sereias e trites. Enquanto arrisca sua vida para salv-la, ele descobre a verdadeira razo pela qual os sereianos travaram uma guerra contra os humanos.

programme.title: Garota em Chamas: Rebelio, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Uma garota do ensino mdio descobre que seus talentos telecinticos so mais perigosos do que imaginava quando perseguida por criminosos. Agora ela ter que descobrir seu passado para controlar seus poderes e sobreviver.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Aps os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de gua na Terra, uma nave enviada at Tit, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a misso de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: O Garoto de Ouro, (2012, Comedy)
programme.desc: Um ex-campeo de luta livre da NCAA est em liberdade condicional aps 10 anos de priso. Agora, para salvar a vida de um amigo, ele concorda em participar em combates extremos. No entanto, ele est sendo solicitado a fazer o impossvel: perder.

programme.desc: Trs irmos vo para as montanhas para se despedir do pai falecido e espalhar suas cinzas.

programme.title: Hurricane - Livre como o Vento, (2021, Children)

programme.title: Dear Dumb Diary, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Uma menina com grande imaginao escreve seus pensamentos em seu dirio pessoal enquanto uma srie de nmeros musicais enche seus sonhos sobre como ela gostaria que sua vida fosse.

programme.title: O Amor Est por A, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Aid repreende Rodrigo por esquecer Felicia e diz para ele visit-la, j que ela est convalescente. Ele vai at l e Felicia faz uma cena de cimes por causa da foto dele com Matilda.

programme.title: A Filha do Meu Melhor Amigo, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: David e Paige so vizinhos de Terry e Carol. Seus filhos Vanessa e Toby so amigos de Nina, que retornou aps cinco anos fora. As mes queriam Nina com Toby, mas ela se envolveu com o pai de sua ex-amiga, abalando as duas famlias.

programme.title: 4 Garotas - Uma Grande Confuso, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Iris, nova assistente temporria em empresa de crdito, forma amizade com Margaret, Paula e Jane. Harmonia do grupo abalada aps chegada de funcionria efetiva e misteriosos roubos no escritrio.

programme.title: Preciso Ser Pai, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Jonah um jovem playboy que no liga para muitas coisas na vida. Aps um encontro conturbado com Becky, ele descobre que tem cncer e pode ficar infrtil. Agora, a nica preocupao de Jonah ter um filho antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Muita Calma Nessa Hora, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: As amigas Mari, Tita e Aninha viajam para Bzios e, no caminho, conhecem Estrella, uma garota que pede carona para tentar achar seu pai. Juntas, as quatro garotas vivem situaes engraadas e emocionantes.

programme.title: Uma Longa Queda, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Quatro estranhos planejam saltar juntos do mesmo edifcio na vspera do Ano Novo. Eles formam uma espcie de famlia problemtica e decidem que tm seis semanas para encontrar razes legtimas para continuar vivos.

programme.title: Trs Ladres e um Beb, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: O compulsivo jogador Slipper v o sequestro do neto de um magnata a salvao de suas dvidas. Quando, junto com seu senhorio e o oportunista Octopus, sequestra BB, sem saber, frustram os planos do crime organizado, que tambm est atrs da criana.

programme.title: Encontro Selvagem, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Les Moore um homem de negcios que teve um encontro inesperado aps algumas bebidas em Albuquerque, Novo Mxico. Desde ento o fato fica revirando em sua cabea, at que ele decide voltar ao local junto com sua colega de trabalho.

programme.title: Um Santo Vizinho, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Maggie e seu filho de 12 anos se mudam para o Brooklyn. Um vizinho se oferece para cuidar do menino enquanto ela trabalha. Sem outra opo, ela aceita. Apesar de levar Oliver para lugares indevidos, a amizade faz muito bem ao garoto.

programme.title: O Relgio Encantado, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Angel uma garota tmida que odeia dizer no. Ela encontra um relgio mgico que realiza desejos e a torna incrivelmente popular. Mas essa nova vida talvez no a deixe realmente feliz.

programme.title: O Jovem Viking, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Halvdan no o tipo perfeito de viking, pois manca e considerado pelas outras crianas um estranho solitrio e sem amigos. Um dia, durante suas excurses solitrias ao rio, ele encontra Meia, a filha corajosa do rei.

programme.title: Com Amor, Van Gogh, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um ano aps o suicdio de Vincent Van Gogh, Armand Roulin parte para a cidade francesa de Arles e, junto s pessoas que conheceram Vincent, inicia uma investigao no intuito de decifrar se o artista realmente se matou.

programme.title: Anton - Laos de Amizade, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: A amizade entre um garoto judeu e outro cristo, companheiros inseparveis, em uma pequena vila da Ucrnia invadida pelos bolcheviques depois da Primeira Guerra Mundial.

programme.title: Ma ma, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Aps ser diagnosticada com cncer de mama, Magda descobre estar grvida. Alm de contar com o apoio de seu novo companheiro e do filho, ela acredita no poder de cura da menina que espera.

programme.title: Contos do Caador de Sombras, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Pu Songling um caador de demnios que precisa usar toda a sua maestria para salvar as garotas de uma comunidade chinesa de espritos malignos sequestradores.

programme.title: Colossal, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Gloria descobre que est conectada uma criatura gigantesca que est destruindo Seul e deve descobrir por que a sua existncia aparentemente insignificante tem um impacto to colossal sobre o destino da Terra.

programme.title: Assalto em Dose Dupla, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Duas quadrilhas atrapalhadas e inexperientes resolvem assaltar o mesmo banco, no mesmo dia. No meio da confuso, Tripp, um charmoso cliente, faz de tudo para proteger a bela caixa Kaitlin, e para completar, o sistema de segurana bloqueia as sadas.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2, (2006, Crime)
programme.desc: A romancista Catherine est novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avali-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e atrado para um jogo sedutor.

programme.desc: Um psiclogo criminal e um especialista em impresses digitais trabalham juntos para rastrear um assassino em srie.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas no demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: Co de briga, (2005, Action)

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Damien e Leito esto retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma misso para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco lderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os servios secretos da cidade tomem medidas drsticas para resolver o problema.

programme.title: Acima da Lei, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um ex-mafioso que se tornou empresrio e um detetive da polcia devem lutar com um ex-policial sujo que quer levar o assassino de seu filho justia.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chins, (2009, Action)

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras

programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.desc: Yoshihiro Kira spots Kosaku Kawajiri and instantly recognizes that its actually his son, Yoshikage. Meanwhile, Josuke, Okuyasu, and Mikitaka find a strange man living in an abandoned electrical tower.

programme.desc: Josuke enters the electrical tower again to save Mikitaka and defeat Toyohiro Kanedaichi. Meanwhile, Rohan receives a visit from a first-class architect named Masazo Kinoto, whos come to estimate the repair costs to his burnt house.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 3
programme.desc: Rohan finds himself possessed by Masazo Kinotos Stand, Cheap Trap, who tells the manga artist to burn the photos he took of the people in Morioh. Meanwhile, Josuke and Yuya encounter the Stand user responsible for Koichis disappearance.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 4
programme.desc: Rohan calls over Koichi to help him fight off Cheap Trap, which has attached itself onto Rohans back. Unfortunately, Koichi thinks Rohan is pulling a prank on him and leaves.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bites the Dust, Part 1
programme.desc: Kosaku Kawajiri is forced to kill Hayato after the boy threatens to expose him as a killer. To make matter worse, Kosaku learns from his father, Yoshihiro, that Rohan and the others are coming to investigate the Kawajiri family shortly.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bites the Dust, Part 2
programme.desc: Yoshikage Kira gains a new ability called Bites the Dust, a bomb that automatically kills anyone who tries to discover Kiras identity through Hayato. Realizing that the only people who could stop Kira are ones with similar powers.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shining D (Diamond) is Unbreakable, Part 1
programme.desc: Hayatos attempt to kill Kira using Stray Cats air bullet ends in failure. Kira realizes that letting Hayato repeat the same morning is becoming a risk, so he decides to undo Bites the Dust after he sees through Rohans death.

programme.desc: Josuke and Hayato hide inside a nearby residence to escape from Deadly Queen and Stray Cats attack. But to their horror, Kira is somehow able to close in on them from outside the house.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: A closely guarded Zoldyck family secret is revealed.

programme.desc: A new technologically-superior Soviet nuclear sub is heading for the U.S. coast; however, one CIA analyst thinks the captain will defect the submarine, and he only has hours to prove it.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Days of Thunder, (1990, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: Discovered by businessman Tim Daland, Cole is teamed with legendary crew chief and car-builder Harry Hogge to race for the Winston Cup at the Daytona 500. A crash nearly ends Coles career and he must turn to a beautiful doctor to regain his nerve.

programme.title: Boss Jirocho waits, confident that Idate will win. But Aoi, the ninja sent by the Wagarashi clan, stands in the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is promoted to chunin, and he and his squadmates celebrate at a BBQ restaurant. In the hospital, Lee decides to undergo a dangerous surgery to repair his body so that he can remain a ninja.

programme.title: Naruto and Sasuke release their ultimate weapons against each other, and just in time, Kakashi arrives to stop the fight.

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four, Kidomaru, Sakon, Jirobo and Tayuya, suddenly appear before Sasuke. Sakura is concerned about the Curse Mark placed on Sasuke by Orochimaru

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four race toward Orochimarus lair with Sasuke in hand. Theyre discovered and challenged by the jonin Genma and Raido
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are trapped in Jirobos Earth Dome Prison. They try to pound their way out, but the walls regenerate each time.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After they are freed from the Earth Dome Prison, Shikamaru and the others take off after the remaining Sound while Choji stays behind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After Choji takes the yellow pill it looks as if he may win the battle, until Jirobo transforms into Second State, giving him immense power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Assuming that the Leaf squad could never get past Jirobo, the remaining Sound ninja dont bother to lay traps along the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Neji takes on Kidomaru while the others continue their pursuit of Sasuke and the remaining Sound ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kidomaru changes tactics and creates a bow and arrow to attack Nejis blind spot.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Shikamaru, Kiba and Akamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke and the Sound ninja. Naruto and Kiba are upset that they have been unable to catch up and decide to try a surprise attack at night.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru sets explosives in the trees to trap Sakon. But an incensed Sakon turns the tables, and the explosives end up sending Kiba, Akamaru and Sakon off a cliff.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is determined to stop Tayuya, but she uses her Summoning Jutsu to call forth three giants. Meanwhile, on the plains, the battle between Kimimaro and Naruto is about to begin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Ukon, who is able to infiltrate the bodies of others, enters Kibas body and tries to merge with his cells.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With Rock Lee there to take on Kimimaro, Naruto is free to chase after Sasuke, who has awakened.

programme.title: Shikamaru, Kiba and Lee are at the limits of their strength when Gaara, Temari and Kankuro appear to assist their Leaf allies.

programme.title: Kimimaro realizes that close combat is impossible against Gaaras wall of sand, so he moves further away for a long-distance attack.

programme.title: Kimimaro succeeds in shattering Gaaras protective sand shield and attacks Gaara. Naruto finally catches up to Sasuke
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With the Curse Mark covering half his body, Sasuke is no longer the Sasuke of old. Naruto charges at this new Sasuke who has turned his back on his closest comrades.

programme.title: Naruto tries desperately to change Sasukes mind, but Sasuke is determined to go to Orochimaru. He tells Naruto that in order to surpass his brother, Itachi, power and hatred are necessary.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is brought down by Sasukes Fire Style: Fireball Jutsu. It is a jutsu passed down through generations of the Uchiha family
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sasuke quietly watches as Naruto sinks deeper in the water. He recalls the past when the Uchiha clan was cruelly slaughtered.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kakashi uses his Summoning Jutsu and sends ninja dogs to track Naruto and Sasuke. With his newfound strength, Sasuke is serious about bringing down Naruto

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The fierce battle with Sasuke leaves Naruto unconscious. Kakashi finally arrives at his side.

programme.title: Sakura tries to sneak out of the village to find Sasuke, but Naruto intercepts her.

programme.title: Naruto, Sakura and Jiraiya search for information in a town in the Land of Rice Paddies.

programme.title: Shottas, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: Two young men from Jamaica climb to the top of the criminal world in Miami, with a constant presence of drugs, extortion, and deceit.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: King of the Avenue, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: An ambitious drug dealer sells his soul to the devil to become the city's biggest drug boss, knowing that when Satan comes to collect, he'll have to outwit a most evil force.

programme.title: Cop Land, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Director James Mangold (FORD vs FERRARI) extends his crime thriller classic that brings together a powerhouse cast, including Robert De Niro, Sylvester Stallone, Ray Liotta, and Harvey Keitel.

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: After a seemingly perfectly planned robbery goes awry, a group of criminals begin to suspect there is a traitor in the ranks, and back at their headquarters try to suss out the culprit.

programme.title: Jackie Brown, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A female flight attendant becomes a key figure in a plot between the police and an arms dealer.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: Depp stars in the title role as a man unjustly sent to prison who vows revenge, not only for his punishment, but for the devastating consequences that happened to his wife and daughter.

programme.title: Anna And The Apocalypse, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: In this gleeful mashup, Anna and her friends must fight and sing their way through a zombie invasion to reach the supposed safety of their school, not knowing if their parents and friends will still be alive when they get there.

programme.title: Repo! The Genetic Opera, (2008, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An epidemic of organ failures devastates the planet, and those who cannot afford their treatments are hunted by Repo Men in this unique production that modernizes the rock opera genre.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: Depp stars in the title role as a man unjustly sent to prison who vows revenge, not only for his punishment, but for the devastating consequences that happened to his wife and daughter.

programme.title: The Commitments, (1991, Soundtrack)
programme.desc: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.

programme.title: Hearts Beat Loud, (2018, Comedy)
programme.desc: A father and daughter form an unlikely songwriting duo in the summer before she leaves for college.

programme.title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople, (2016, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Ricky is a defiant young city kid who finds himself on the run with his cantankerous foster uncle in the wild New Zealand bush. A national manhunt ensues, and the two are forced to put aside their differences and work together.

programme.title: The Crocodile Hunter: Collision Course, (2002, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: The Crocodile Hunter (Steve Irwin) is trying to save a feisty croc from poachers. What he doesn't know is that the crocodile has swallowed a top secret U.S. satellite beacon, and the poachers are actually American special agents sent to retrieve it.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee, (1986, Screwball)
programme.desc: Michael J. Crocodile Dundee is a free-spirited Australian who hunts crocodiles with his bare hands, stares down giant water buffaloes, and drinks mere mortals under the table.

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Adventure)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.title: Major League II, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

programme.title: Major League: Back to the Minors, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Minor league pitcher Gus Cantrell is given the opportunity to manage the South Carolina Buzz. The ailing baseball team is full of a wacky lineup of terrible players, but owner Roger Dorn is banking on Cantrell to make a top-notch franchise out of them.

programme.title: Necessary Roughness, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: The Texas State Armadillos are fourth down and nowhere-to-go after a corruption scandal nearly ends the football program. Now upstanding coach Ed Gennero (Hector Elizondo) must put together a brand-new team.

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Adventure)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.title: Major League II, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

programme.title: Major League: Back to the Minors, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Minor league pitcher Gus Cantrell is given the opportunity to manage the South Carolina Buzz. The ailing baseball team is full of a wacky lineup of terrible players, but owner Roger Dorn is banking on Cantrell to make a top-notch franchise out of them.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Inspirational Drama)

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted, (1999, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Winona Ryder and Academy Award(r)-winner Angelina Jolie are the certifiable stars of Claymoore Hospital's South Bell ward in this wry adaptation of Susanna Kaysen's best-selling memoir.

programme.title: Bad News Bears in Breaking Training, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story picks up the Bears career a year after their infamous second-place finish in the North Valley League. Faced with a chance to play the Houston Toros for a shot at the Japanese champs, they devise a way to get Texas to play at the famed Astrodome.

programme.title: Bad News Bears Go To Japan, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Caught in a clash of cultures and ready to wreak more havoc on Japan than Godzilla, the Bad News Bears are back this time the Bears are spirited off to Tokyo by a slick and sleazy con artist who sees in the team a perfect peg for a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: Meatballs, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars as Tripper who guides a fun-seeking collection of lovable campers and libidinous staff members through the unique pleasures of a hysterical coed summer experience.

programme.title: Hit!, (1973, Blaxploitation)
programme.desc: U.S. agent Nick Allen (Billy Dee Williams) has his own idea about how to fight a war on drugs: go to the source...and cut the big-time traffickers down. Embittered over the drug-related death of his teenage daughter, Nick sets out to do just that.

programme.title: The Bad News Bears, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: A major surprise as one of 1976's top-grossing films. THE BAD NEWS BEARS is a movie about children that is refreshing, utterly believable, and quite cleverly funny.

programme.title: Bad News Bears in Breaking Training, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story picks up the Bears career a year after their infamous second-place finish in the North Valley League. Faced with a chance to play the Houston Toros for a shot at the Japanese champs, they devise a way to get Texas to play at the famed Astrodome.

programme.title: Bad News Bears Go To Japan, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Caught in a clash of cultures and ready to wreak more havoc on Japan than Godzilla, the Bad News Bears are back this time the Bears are spirited off to Tokyo by a slick and sleazy con artist who sees in the team a perfect peg for a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Hair, (1979, Musical)
programme.desc: A country boy and Vietnam draftee embark on an adventure of a lifetime when he meets a group of counterculture hippies and his eyes are opened to the darker side of class, race, and big city life in this adaptation of the Broadway sensation.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato finally meets his son Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ill Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!

programme.title: As the Minks struggle with a poor hand against the Gifters, Kin'emon tries to assist them, but Dogstorm and Cat Viper stop him and start fighting for the other Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!

programme.title: Who's-Who invites Drake and Hawkins to a plot to kill Queen. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats are facing two large monsters that remind them of the Giant who they once struggled to take down. As Luffy charges towards them, someone unexpected comes in to help.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!

programme.title: Drake vows to fight alongside Luffy, but Zoro becomes skeptical and challenges him to a fight. Meanwhile, Usopp's practical joke pushes Nami into confronting Ulti, who is infuriated since her brother got attacked.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!

programme.title: Queen uses a new version of the Plague Bullets which will turn the samurai into ogre-like monsters. Meanwhile, the Minks keep pushing the fight against the Gifters and drive Jack into a corner. However, Kaido stands up for his subordinate.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!

programme.title: While Luffy is hurrying to the rooftop and Yamato is trying to catch up to Momonosuke to protect him, the Akazaya members finally face off against Kaido.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Odens Secret Swordplay!

programme.title: Queen, the Lead Performer, blazes away at samurai on the Performance Floor with the special version of the Plague Rounds, which turns them into hideous ogres that corner Zoro and Drake
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!

programme.title: King orders his subordinates to go after Momonosuke. Shinobu tries to protect him, but they are cornered by one of the strong Lead Performers from the Animal Kingdom Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Wont Forgive Him! Choppers Determination!

programme.title: Yamato fights Sasaki and the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy's declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sasakis Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!

programme.title: Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Choppers Fire Trick!

programme.title: Sanji hears a woman's scream for help and dashes into the room the scream can be heard from. However, it's a trap set up by Black Maria of the Tobi Roppo. Meanwhile, Luffy and Jimbei who are trying to reach the rooftop get help from the unexpected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Its Not Okay! The Spider lures Sanji!

programme.title: While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido's head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Yamatos Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!

programme.title: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro's way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro's determination and tries to pave the way for him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Marcos Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!

programme.title: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy's strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he's ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls "heaven."
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!

programme.title: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!

programme.title: Luffy pummels Kaido with his well-trained Kong Gatling and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way and Kid and Killer also try to finish Kaido off.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. the New Generation!

programme.title: After watching the Straw Hats' departure to Onigashima, Tama wondered if there was anything she could do to help the Straw Hats and the samurai. Now that she's here on Onigashima, it's time to execute her powerful plan Operation Kibi Dango!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Otamas Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!

programme.title: Sanji is captured and tortured by the merciless Black Maria. She names the terms of his release: to turn over one of his crewmates. He hesitates but has no other option. After much distress, he makes a move that surprises everyone.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanjis Scream! An SOS Echoes Over the Island!

programme.title: Robin bursts in to rescue Sanji along with Brook, and faces Black Maria, who is trying to keep Sanji as her pet. Meanwhile, Yamato, Momonosuke, and Shinobu are spotted hiding by the enemy, and they find themselves on the run again.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Chopper works hard to make the cure for Ice Oni, even though he is turning into one himself. Meanwhile, the infected Boss Hyogoro the Flower regains his youth and fights fiercely to protect Chopper and the others.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!

programme.title: Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do other than grieve. However, it wasn't just them who were devastated by Queen's raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The wounded Akazaya members are surprised to see Kozuki Oden alive. They were disappointed by their failure to take down Kaido, but now with their lord, they are filled with hope to face their sworn enemy again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Akazaya Members!

programme.title: The Akazaya members run to save Momonosuke, but an unexpected contender stands in their way. Queen gets infuriated after Chopper ruined his plot and goes after him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Generation Gets Wiped Out?! The Emperors Deadly Attack!

programme.title: The returned Orochi clashes the Akazaya members who are trying to save Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others are all covered in bruises, but they unite their strength and launch an attack.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!

programme.title: Even after Big Mom was pushed off of the island, Zoro and the others keep fighting the exhausting battle against Kaido. When Kaido tries to beat up the unconscious Luffy, Zoro launches an all-out attack at the risk of his life.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defend Luffy! Zoro and Laws Sword Technique!

programme.title: Luffy remembers how he was advised by his friends, how he was saved by his comrades, and the frustrations of being defeated. As Kaido mocks him to his face, the Color of the Supreme King Haki gushes out and they clash again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!

programme.title: Countless souls have been lured along the Grand Line in pursuit of the legendary One Piece! Luffy D. Monkey is a young pirate with a dream: to prove the legend true and be king of them all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'm Luffy! The Man Who's Gonna Be King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Luffy and his new companion Coby set sail in search of the infamous pirate hunter Zoro, rumored to be held captive at the Marine Base.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro!

programme.title: Luffy is in the line of fire after saving Zoro, and now tyrannical Captain Morgan is out for their heads! Zoro must decide if he will join forces with Luffy or die in captivity.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Morgan versus Luffy! Who's the Mysterious Pretty Girl?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?
programme.sub-title: Wads of Bills Blossomed in the Sunset of Rio

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko and a mystery man have an enticing job for Lupin: Stealing a ton of gold bullion from a Swiss Bank, a bank renowned for its tight security. Can it be done? What is the mystery man's true identity?
programme.sub-title: I'll Teach You How to Transport Gold Bars

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A man is threatening to destroy the Leaning Tower of Pisa with a device that generates artificial earthquakes. The Italian government has no choice but to meet the culprit's, but Lupin takes the ransom for himself!
programme.sub-title: Will the Leaving Tower of Pisa Be Standing?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.
programme.sub-title: The Great Chase in San Francisco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vault maker Marukin Safe Company is forced into bankruptcy after Lupin cracks open their impenetrable safes. To test his own skills, Marukin's son challenges Lupin to open a safe he has designed

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: While trying to snag General Hatler's prize medallion, which contains a fifty-carat ruby, Lupin inadvertently reels in Hatler's biggest secret, his toupee! An enraged General Hatler orders Lupin and his gang to be killed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Upon returning to Japan, Goemon finds his master on the brink of death. Furthermore, Jinkuro, a fellow disciple, had stolen half of the scroll containing the Secret Arts of the Iga Ninja. Will Goemon be able to avenge his master?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are in a remote area pursing a mysterious treasure, when they save a woman being chased by hoodlums. The woman invites the two back to her sister's manor, which is full of beautiful women

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A mysterious woman who claims to be Fujiko's aunt, gives Lupin an ultimatum: Find Marshal Rommel's lost gold or die! First, Lupin must decipher the location of the gold, written in ancient hieroglyphs.
programme.sub-title: A Witch in the Fourth Dimension

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The great thief Nezumi-Kozou Jirokichi IV appears before Goemon and reveals that their ancestors competed in the first International Thieves Championship together, but were defeated by Lupin's grandfather, Arsne Lupin
programme.sub-title: The Phantom Thief Rat Boy Appears

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The warden of an African prison is holding Fujiko captive. Lupin and his gang infiltrate the prison and attempt to break Fujiko out, but they become the target of the Iron Lizards, robotic devices developed to chase down fugitives!

programme.title: Close Range, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: A rogue soldier turned outlaw is thrust into a relentless fight with a corrupt sheriff, his obedient deputies, and a dangerous drug cartel in order to protect his family.

programme.title: Apocalypto, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Legion, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When God loses faith in mankind, he sends his Legion of angels to wipe out the human race for the second time. Man's only hope lies in a group of misfits holed up in a desert diner.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiance, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Crow: City of Angels, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: This fast-moving, action-packed sequel to THE CROW follows the rise of murder victim Ashe Corven, brought back to life by a mysterious crow. With the help of a woman named Sarah, he exacts revenge on his killers one by one.

programme.title: Riders In The Sky, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry helps a gal clear her father's name who is accused of murdering a gambler. When the leader of the gamblers gets involved, it's up to Gene and his comic pal Pat Buttram to outwit the badmen.

programme.title: Riders Of The Whistling Pines, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry believes he has accidentally shot a man, but learns that the guilt lies with men trying to stop a destructive moth infestation. Will modern chemicals be used to save the day, against Gene?

programme.title: Dakota, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: In 1871 Dakota, two crooked businessmen oppose the local wheat farmers and the railroad development, in order to control the town of Fargo.

programme.title: Fort Yuma, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: When a revered Apache chief is brutally murdered en route to Fort Yuma to negotiate a peace treaty, all-out war erupts in this rousing -- and surprisingly touching -- western starring Peter Graves and directed by the legendary Lesley Selander.

programme.title: Cariboo Trail, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: Montanans Jim Redfern and Mike Evans head into Canada's British Columbia via the Cariboo Trail intent to raise cattle and dig for gold but find trouble instead.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Drama)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon, (1970, Musical)
programme.desc: A Michigan farmer and a prospector form a partnership in the California gold country. Their adventures include buying and sharing a wife...

programme.title: The Brass Legend, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: When a sheriff arrests a notorious outlaw based on a boy's tip, he faces both public scorn and a dangerous gang intent on freeing their comrade. This Western showdown proves that a lawman's greatest test isn't his aim, but his character.

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Drama)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the armyand each other!

programme.title: The Perfect Guy, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman meets an IT expert who seems to be the perfect guy. But after a sex charged courtship, she sees a violent side of him and dissolves the relationship. In jealous rage and fueled by insane revenge, he violates her privacy.

programme.title: Only Lovers Left Alive, (2013, Vampires)
programme.desc: Driven by sensual photography, trance-like music, and droll humor, Jim Jarmuschs ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE is a meditation on art, science, and the mysteries of everlasting love.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaskas population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husbands murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Along Came A Spider, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: After the harrowing death of his partner, detective and best-selling author Alex Cross has retreated to the peace of retirement. But when a brilliant criminal (Michael Wincott) kidnaps a senators young daughter, Alex is lured back into action.

programme.title: Cloverfield, (2007, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Five young New Yorkers face a life or death struggle in order to escape from the city when a monster the size of a skyscraper suddenly appears.

programme.title: Along Came A Spider, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: After the harrowing death of his partner, detective and best-selling author Alex Cross has retreated to the peace of retirement. But when a brilliant criminal (Michael Wincott) kidnaps a senators young daughter, Alex is lured back into action.

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Heist Films)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.
